thread.title: Great hotel next to Chanel studio
thread.title_full: Great hotel next to Chanel studio - Review of Castille Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Cindy T
title: Great hotel next to Chanel studio
text: I have stayed in Castille during my business trip and really enjoyed it. My room was very elegant, black-n-white combination. Big, comfortable bed. Closet large enough to fit all my stuff. There was a shower as well as bath in my room. Even the windows were facing the rue Cambon, the room was quiet. I had a breakfast as well as a quick lunch in the hotel restaurant, everything was good. The staff is really friendly and helpful. And the hotel cat ... I was so happy to meet a beautiful Olivier, amazing cat boy living in this hotel. I wish he could join me to the room :-)
